text:
Hyrecar | Software Engineer | Los Angeles | Full-Time | ONSITE| $95k-$135k + + options + benefits

Stack: React, GraphQL, Docker - https://stackshare.io/hyrecar

We are looking for seasoned software engineers to lead, architect, design, prototype, code, test, deploy, maintain, and improve our web and native applications.

HyreCar servers all our customers using web apps that are mobile friendly, written in React.JS. The backend is GraphQL and Apollo. We are in the process of building React Native apps.

Apply here : https://www.indeed.com/job/software-team-lead-d1d10494f24afd...

or Email: abhi@hyrecar.com
